channel.title: Please add official release for VMWare - virtualbox sometimes doesn't work
channel.description:
I was unable to make whonix work with VMWare. There is a computer that doesn't support VirtualBox at all! On virtualbox forums people say sometimes it happen but Oracle doesn't care - it's a free product.
Please make a special release for WMWare for windows. Very needed. A donation for this work can be done if needed. Thanks

item.title: Please add official release for VMWare - virtualbox sometimes doesn't work
